:level-indent.description: The amount of indentation between levels

auto-open.description: By default, all multi-level menus are expanded
auto-open.description_zh: 默认展开所有多级菜单

v-model:collapsed.description: Whether or not to collapse the menu

default-collapsed.description: The default is whether to collapse the menu

auto-scroll-into-view.description: Whether to automatically scroll the selected items to the visible area
auto-scroll-into-view.description_zh: 是否自动滚动选中项目到可见区域

show-collapse-button.description: Whether or not there is a built-in folding button

v-model:selected-keys.description_zh: 选中的菜单项 key 数组

default-selected-keys.description: The default selected menu item key array
default-selected-keys.description_zh: 默认选中的菜单项 key 数组

v-model:open-keys.description_zh: 展开的子菜单 key 数组

:default-open-keys.description: The default expanded submenu key array
:default-open-keys.description_zh: 默认展开的子菜单 key 数组

scroll-config.description: Scroll to the config item in the visible area to receive all scroll-into-view-if-needed parameters
scroll-config.description_zh: 滚动到可见区域的配置项，接收所有scroll-into-view-if-needed的参数

:trigger-props.description: Props that accept all triggers are accepted in pop-up mode
:trigger-props.description_zh: 弹出模式下可接受所有 Trigger 的 Props

:tooltip-props.description: All ToolTip props are accepted in pop-up mode
:tooltip-props.description_zh: 弹出模式下可接受所有 ToolTip 的 Props

auto-open-selected.description: By default, the selected menu is expanded

breakpoint.type: xxl / xl / lg / md / sm / xs
breakpoint.description: Responsive breakpoints, see Responsive Rasters for details
breakpoint.description_zh: 响应式的断点, 详见响应式栅格

popup-max-height.description: The maximum height of the pop-up box

events.name: collapse
events.description: Triggered when the collapse status changes

events.name: menu-item-click
events.description: Triggered when a menu item is clicked

events.name: sub-menu-click
events.description: Triggered when the submenu is clicked
